name: Sigma - Visual Memory Training
description:
1- Memorize the pieces with the same sign.

2- The pieces will be turned.

3- Select the pieces of the same sign, and press the button 'try' to remove them.

4- Destroying pieces will fill a dopamine bar, when it filled up you'll gain a life.

Controls

- Select pieces: (PC) Left click (Mobile) First touch

- Unselect pieces: (PC) Right click (Mobile) Second touch
